snippet: BURNS--Edward Eliot, Jr.,aged 80, passed peacefully on July 3, 2016 in York, ME. A retired financial advisor, devoted husband, father and grandfather. Graduate of Deerfield Academy, Dartmouth and Tuck School of Business. Lieutenant for the United ...
lead_paragraph: BURNS--Edward Eliot, Jr.,aged 80, passed peacefully on July 3, 2016 in York, ME. A retired financial advisor, devoted husband, father and grandfather. Graduate of Deerfield Academy, Dartmouth and Tuck School of Business. Lieutenant for the United States Coast Guard. Joined First Boston Corporation, then Mitchell Hutchins/ Paine Webber. Married Windy Reid, 1979. Partner, Stover Haley Burns, Inc. Survived by his wife, Windy; two sons from first marriage, Ned Burns, wife Jennifer Burns, children Erik and Charlie Burns; and Christopher Burns, wife Gina Nagy-Burns. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BURNS, EDWARD ELIOT, JR.
